storyContent.title: As a patient, I want to schedule an appointment online so that I can see my doctor without calling
storyContent.description:
Patients currently have to call the office to schedule appointments, which is inconvenient. We need to provide an online appointment scheduling feature that allows patients to:

- View available appointment slots
- Select a provider
- Choose a date and time
- Receive confirmation

This will reduce call volume and improve patient satisfaction.
storyContent.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I am a logged-in patient
When I navigate to the appointment scheduling page
And I select a provider from the dropdown
And I choose an available time slot
And I click "Schedule Appointment"
Then the appointment should be created in the system
And I should see a confirmation message
And I should receive a confirmation email
And the appointment should appear in my "My Appointments" list
